snippet: The third quarter has proved to be good for yet another firm, as the Carlyle Group swung to profitability on the improving value of its holdings.
abstract: The third quarter has proved to be good for yet another firm, as the Carlyle Group swung to profitability on the improving value of its holdings.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Swings to Profit as Its Asset Values Rise
